name: William Beck
text: The food tasted ok but was room temperature. I arrived five minutes before my order ready time and waited 30 minutes after it. Dinner rush is no excuse for serving cold food, even McDonald's is capable of avoiding that. ‚Ä¶More

text: Staff was amazing! Food was delicious. I wish we had had cash to tip! Will catch you next time. Thanks for a great meal.

name: Robert Sherrill
text: Our experience recently was just the best. It was my wife's birthday and the staff treated her not like "just another customer." They genuinely cared and treated my family like we mattered to them. Brandy, Max, Spencer, Vernisa, and Ben showed excellent customer service! Give this place lots of your business!

name: Alex Smith
text: The crew tonight was awesome!! Every single one of them greeted us and were so friendly .So happy this location is back open!

text: Incredible service! It was a tricky day because of ice and power outages, but the employees made our experience enjoyable and gave us a free pizza pass! 11/10

name: Tom Wingate
text: Best pizza ..best price... totally custom pizza at Pizza Hut prices.  We loved this. Thanks.

name: Briana Alhamdani
text: Wow! Just wow!! This is the cr√©m de la cr√©m of pizza fast food style! Soooo delicious! And they have amazing GF options and for someone like me who has a major gluten allergy that‚Äôs a HUGE plus! The food was phenomenal even my 3 year old ‚Ä¶More

name: Brentleigh Elysabeth Rousey

name: Seemj Jack
text: They had fell off for a while.  But today was not the case . I bought two pizzas on the promotion  buy one get one free. It was WORTH  the trip. Soooo  delicious  I tip it was so good! She did an awesome job! So good.

name: M VA
text: We love eating here. They have a great keto crust pizza. Delicious food and great staff.

name: John Bordy
text: Mediocre crust that is thin and flavorless.  The top of the pizza was cooked fine, but the bottom was overcooked. Blackened parts on crust bottom did not taste good. My wife appreciated the keto crust option and thought that was okay. Overall though, I think there are better pizza choices available.

name: serena timmons
text: Great Fresh ingredients..Awesome customer service

name: Sarah Plainandsmall
text: I love Blaze. I appreciate that they allow you to build your own pizza with unlimited quality toppings. No extra charge for "premium" toppings. The staff is always friendly and Jason is the bomb dot com at building your pizza:) a quick, affordable, sharable meal.

name: Amanda S
text: Best vegan pizza around!! I always go for the build-your-own and load it down with veggies! My momma kinda went light on hers! Regardless, you can't go wrong! Blaze also got rid of using straws (unless you ask for one). Kudos, Blaze Pizza! ‚ù§Ô∏èüî•‚ù§Ô∏è

name: ruke T907
text: Best pizza around very clean and the staff are very nice

name: Brad Winter
text: Not bad. When it's busy the line moves so slow. But, the customer service is great. I had a great conversation with the guy making my pizza. I love changing up the way I get my pizza every time.

name: Hermorene Douglas-Ezeobele
text: Omg, this was awesome. I had a meat pizza and BLT salad. Both are perfectly made and delicious.

name: Nico Catania
text: Best pizza franchise in Oklahoma! Since I first ate there, I haven't gone to another pizza shop, it's just too good. Even though it's a bit more expensive than, for instance, Little Caesars or Domino's I can say it's completely worth it. I wish there were more Blaze stores around the city.

name: Keno The Mowf Piece Traylor
text: It's good pizza but they nd to teach the kids that work there to change there gloves after touch something gloves protect us from gems but if you touch other thing with gloves on your  Cross contamination other then that blaze pizza is good and fresh if the right employers are there

name: Stanley Steemer
text: I liked the pizza but, the bottom was a bit burnt. I more of an hand-tossed kinda guy. Mabe I might be a bit bias. Overall the pizza was good.

name: Janeen Stephens
text: First but not last time visiting this place. Excellent!!

name: Colter Williams
text: They have keto friendly crust! The people there are super kind and make you feel like family. If you are on the keto diet and need some pizza blaze is your place!

name: Kaela Langston
text: This pizza place is so yummy. There are so many pizza places around, but Blaze is our new obsession. Their ingredients are fresh and their portions are great! Visit this place for a pleasant surprise!

name: Rachel Scott

name: Sean G.
text: The pizza was fresh, delicious, and cooked to perfection, and the staff were friendly, and attentive. Even compared to much larger chains, that can afford to make their food a lot cheaper, a whole meal was really not that expensive, for ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Hill
text: Not open still closed due to COVID restrictions

name: Lorain Anderson
text: I really love  Blaze Pizza. Build your own is great. Prices are good also. Employees are great and helpful.

name: Tracy McDaniel
text: Pizza wa great. But Caesar salad seemed old and soggy. üòí

name: Keisha Taylor
text: The pizza was so delicious! The ingredients was nice and fresh. And they have real mozzarella cheese! That fresh mozzarella just makes the pizza! The wood burning oven, just adds that flavor you can't get from pizza hut and places like that! You have to try it!

name: Jason Thompson
text: Blaze pizza specializes in making individual pizzas.  The food is great and the service was even better.  The place was clean and looked great.  The best part is the price.  The pizzas are under $10 in most cases.  I would recommend this place and would definitely visit again.

name: Michelle Maness
text: I liked the single pizza. Very helpful and friendly when I placed my ordered.

name: Rob Ellis
text: I‚Äôve been to several Blaze Pizza‚Äôs all over the US. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience in any of them.... Until now. Usually the service is phenomenal and the food is well above average.. Two people working at dinner time.. 3 dash orders in ‚Ä¶More

name: Betty J Scott
text: NOT impressed. Paid $4 for "high rise" think they just put 2 crusts together!! Crust is tough!

name: Jasmine Bradford
text: Taliyah and Austin (Blaze Pizza on Memorial) provided excellent customer service. Friendly and Professional. Great People and Great Pizza. I will definitely be back.

name: Rob
text: I always get the build your own. Nice crust and pretty fast service even though it's cooked fresh.

name: Lyn Trosper
text: The food was awesome. They have some wonderful specialty pizzas and fruit infused water, which is available on the all you can drink beverage bar. You can also create your own pizza, at an amazing price, with unlimited toppings. They also ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelli Miller
text: This is the only pizza I'll eat now! You can't beat the fresh ingredients, low price and quick service. Plus they're open later, and if there ever is a line you don't wait long at all! This is how all fast fresh food places should be.

name: Marci Jenkins
text: Beyond slow service. Pizza was awful. The pizza was VISIBLY burnt, black crust and top and they served it to me as if there wasn‚Äôt anything wrong. I‚Äôve never left a bad review but couldn‚Äôt help after the experience we had there. I‚Äôll never go back!

text: Excellent customer service

name: Samantha Masquat-Carmack

name: Hope Meek
text: Great food great service will definitely be going again!

name: Nick Tarter

name: Lauren

name: Jolene Morse

text:

name: Alysha Tracy
text: Thought the pizza was amazing! Love the serving sizes as well. Easy way to fit delicious lower price pizza in on a diet.

name: Michael Welliver
text: There are so many things you can put on your pizza, you could never try all the combinations. Plus they serve beer and wine!

name: skieler hanks

name: mehdi el qasry
text: These guys are legit.  The staff are very polite and the place is clean and well maintained. Try the veg out pizza with some grilled chicken on top and you'll get addicted to their food.

text: Wasn't too bad. My pizza wasn't great but I believe it is due to my own choices and not the staff at Blaze.

name: Jonanthan weiree

text: Store had only been open for a few weeks when I went but the experience was great. Friendly and energetic staff who didn‚Äôt get frustrated when I asked them to explain the menu and ordering process. This pizza is second to none in its class.

name: Brandon Harrison

name: Jessica Sauer

text: I love the options on this pizza place! Even the dough which ranges from High Rise dough to Keto!

name: Mackenzie Jentsch
text: Quick, tasty, and endlessly customizable. I love that you can indulge your guilty pleasure, hello bacon, or create a literal salad on top of your pie. The crust is always crisp without being cracker-y and the service is always welcoming. Don't forget to add a finisher when you pick up your pizza like balsamic glaze or arugula.

name: Josh Cochran
text: Great pizza! Staff could care less about you being there. They do their job and make your pizza.

name: Jon Blackburn
text: The crust was crisp, but still had a great chewiness that is undeniably refreshing.  The ingredients were fresh and tasty, and the beer selection is also great. (F5 FTW!) Definitely great pizza!

name: DeWantae Martin
text: First time here.. Will definitely return

name: Stephanie Pohlman
text: Staff was friendly and helpful and had a great attitude even though I got there 15 minutes to close. I was even encouraged to stay and eat if I wanted to. I know they still have to clean after they close but something you can't do with ‚Ä¶More

name: Dee Miller
text: Great service, great pizza

name: Bolaji Sho
text: Quite friendly staff and prompt service

name: chuckling charlie
text: The pizza was okay but the restaurant itself was filthy. They had just opened at 10:30am & we were there at 11:46am & this place had food, napkins & trash all over the place. There will not be a return visit to the OKC location.

name: Mike Eastman
text: Great format. Great pizza. Blaze makes individual pizzas and has gluten free and thick crust options. Lots of toppings. It is easy to get too much! Got thick crust but wouldn't order it again as it is just two layers of regular crust. ‚Ä¶More

text: Good food, great soda (Blue Sky), but the service is just amazing slow. Compared to revolve or any of the other instant pizza joints it's truly shocking how much slower they are.

name: Brianna Holliday
text: I didn't get the name of the gentleman that took our order, but he ended up helping out the rest of the crew speed up (besides the guy manning the oven, he was great) because they knew one speed which was slow. We've been to the Blaze in ‚Ä¶More

name: Douglas
text: Really expected better from a place so close to the airport, toilet clogged, ok it happens, AC was out in the lobby all 4 days we were there, the washing machine broke, the pool was a light greenish color and smelled like they just shocked it to try and get it back to normal. Idk maybe I shouldn't have expected better but I did

name: Leana Lee
text: Ok, so they want you to tip while you pay prior to eating your pizza! It was our first & last visit

text: Good vegan cheese.  And a GFV crust option.

name: Kim Lasalata
text: Delicious pizza and great staff!

name: Rebecca Spindler
text: SO DELICIOUS!!  I love that you can build your own pizza. The crust is cooked perfectly, the ingredients are all fresh, and the staff is wonderful!!

name: Alex Coates
text: I mean it's like any other pizza place. Even though it's in disney World I've eaten at better pizza places than Blaze.

name: Brandon Rolin
text: I tried Blaze for the first time tonight. I wish I could say disappointment was the most negative adjective I could use to describe my first time at Blaze, but disgusting more accurately encapsulates the whole experience. My girlfriend and ‚Ä¶More

text: The staff did not listen to what my daughter wanted on her pizza.   The put mozzarella on before she had a chance to tell them she wanted goat cheese. Our take twos had to wait for the sides.  Staff seemed a bit unorganized.

name: kimberly bullett
text: Got my made to order pizza incorrect. I also ordered my food to go, and they gave it to me on the pan and forgot to give me my salad.

name: James S
text: Very busy an hour lunch break got my food an hour and 20 minutes wasn't happy at all

name: M Thomas
text: Excellent service , pizza & Price. Fresh Product made to order. They have the concept Subway uses to make their sandwiches how they make your pizza right in front of you which I loved.

name: Shannon Lee
text: First time eating at Blaze and Expectations were met.  Great environment, food and the staff were awesome!!  Will be going back

name: Glenn Cunningham
text: I Love this Place Build your own Pizza Yum!!

name: Romona Turner
text: I love the fact that you can build your own pizza just the way you like. For a reasonable price.

name: Nadia Alba
text: Great place. Go there every other week. Awesome staff. And more than that delicious healthy menu.

name: Dustin Demory
text: Very disorganized in line. Had 2 pizzas ordered both went into oven at the same time .  One came out perfect then the guy running the oven got distracted. Pulled 2 pizzas that went in after mine before finally getting to mine. More than ‚Ä¶More

name: William Warner Productions
text: One of the best places to get a pizza if you're on a plant-based diet! Their vegan cheese is amazing and the topping options are outstanding. Having options at a restaurant that my whole family can eat at means the world to me. Thanks Blaze!!

name: Christopher Hargrove
text: Finally!! We kept hearing how good this place is.  Wow...so good!  Honestly though, the manager Daniel made the whole experience worth going back!  He was so over the top enthusiastic, kind, and accommodating..explained the menu as if he owned the place...so refreshing!  Thank you sir!

name: Nykita Webb
text: The pizza here is as good as you make it because you make it yourself. Its like Subway but with pizza. They have an excellent selection of toppings and crust. The salads are pre-made and delicious. The staff is friendly and welcoming and the atmosphere is very casual.

name: Bianca Jones
text: I have the vegan cheese pizza with spinach & pineapples :) it was so good ! Happy they have vegan and vegetarian options !

name: Breanna White Heckman
text: I love that you can choose all your own toppings for a personal pizza!

name: Jimmy Hardesty
text: The Keto pizza crust is surprisingly really good!

name: Cindy Warmbrodt
text: Best Pizza in the suberbs!  Most delicious topping options, yummy salads and they have Blood Orange soda!  The staff is friendly, but they could do better to work together as a team.  The place is kept way too cold and the women's restroom is not well maintained.  Still delicious pizza though!

name: Kyle B.
text: The pizza was pricey and just okay.

name: Shirley Casey
text: They are not organized! Too many mistakes. They rush you which causes them to make mistakes and it's rude to rush customers!!!

name: Adam Filer
text: Fast service and excellent food. The s'mores are very good

name: Adam Hendricks
text: Pizza always tastes great! They use quality ingredients made to order. The one complaint I have is that they never seem to cook it less or more than usual when I ask for it that way.

name: harley martinez
text: Very friendly employees with a casual atmosphere. The pizza was great and the guy making my pizza made helpful (and tasty) suggestions while I was ‚Äúbuilding‚Äù my pizza.

text: Really good pizza. However I did expect faster service.

name: Pamela Hernandez
text: Build your own pizza with some of the best toppings ever.  I got a half pizza and it was delicious.   I will be back for more.   The GM , Mo is so nice.

name: J B
text: Pizza is made to order, so it's hot and fresh. Price is pretty good for the amount of pizza you get.

name: Teyanna Renee

text: Excellent pizza, almost as good as my own. One price no matter how many toppings.

name: Stephanie May
text: Food is really good but theres one employee on the night shift that was super annoying. She kept yelling HOOOOOOTTTT every time she would take a pizza out of the oven and was being loud and obnoxious. Staff should also keep in mind that the customers can hear everything they say and do even if it's in the back because they are so loud

name: David Eggleston
text: Staff was very friendly. Pizza was cooked perfectly.

name: Monicka Mathis
text: Best personal pizza with unlimited toppings all for one flat price

name: Drew Kaiser
text: Girlfriend ordered a pizza from you on DoorDash. Asked for no arugula and no bacon. Add pepperoni. The pizza we received literally just had arugula on it. Who in the hell would want a pizza with just arugula on it. Tried calling and nobody picks up. Fix this blaze.

name: Lloyd Monroe
text: Notoriously slow... Staff often has tunnel vision. Too focused on their tasks to pay attention to their customers. Ordering online does not prevent a wait once you make it to the store.

name: Jack Andrew
text: Excellent pizza and excellent customer service! Once you finish choosing the toppings of your choice, your pizza is cooked in about 5 minutes!

name: Beth Turner
text: Great pizza and fast service

name: Jacquelyn Looman
text: My first time there, and it was superb!!! Staff was great and the food was just as awesome!!!

name: Molly Roberts
text: I had eaten here the first week it opened and am happy to say that they are tasting better (and actually have all their ingredients!) They are kid friendly with high chairs. I recommend grabbing a salad to-go!

name: Roland Welch
text: Food was amazing and lemonade was great as well. Fast friendly service. Only took 3 minutes to make my pizza. I'll certainly come back! Awesome place to eat!

name: Randy Knight
text: Great pizza and friendly staff. My only complaint is that it's kinda awkward when you walk in and go to order. I'd recommend improving the signage.

name: Mark Matznick
text: Blaze is some of the best pizza for the money. Subway for pizza but BETTER.

name: Roxanne Fisher
text: Great service, staff was welcoming and the pizza was delicious!

name: Jamie Harvey
text: Always delicious and quick

name: AKU NINJA
text: amazing options and delicious pizza

name: MISTI J
text: Love it!! $7.95 for a build your own pizza. Anything you want. I put everything on mine including spicy sauce and it was awesome. The service is really good too. Everyone was so nice as soon as we walked in. That part is more appreciated than the awesome pizza.

name: Matt Parks
text: I've been to other Blaze Pizza's before and they are delicious, but my experience here was not. The girl who made my pizza had NO IDEA what she was doing. I was shocked that someone allowed her to go out there with such little training. Not ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamal Brown
text: This place has quickly become my favorite place to get pizza. Inexpensive and very good. They offer a variety of choices of meats, cheeses and veggies. Can't go wrong with this place. Also, they have a coo staff.

name: Melissa Evans
text: Love this place! Best pizza by far! Ingredients fresh & made just the way I want it. Super fast. Lemonade is delicious!  I tell everyone they should try this place!

name: Terry Franklin
text: Great fresh pizza and fast! Loved it!!

name: Janiece Upshaw
text: Delicious pizza and Cookies! You have to try the Cookies

name: Sami Latreille
text: This place had the best pizza ever!! They are super friendly and we had a laugh with the employees. The food was done within 10 minutes. I will definitely be going back here as much as possible!

name: Patrice
text: This place very is awesome. Kee is the best. She remembered our names when we walked in, it was great.. I have an allergy to gluten and they have gluten free pizza crust. Shame on me but good for them, I have been here 3 days in a row. Lol

name: Lee Smiley
text: Great pizza and friendly staff.

name: April Cooper
text: Choose your own toppings from a wide selection of fresh ingredients.  Your pizza is prepared while you watch then baked to perfection in the open fire pizza oven.  Delicious!  Plus, the drinks are great as well!

name: Angela Pham
text: 10/10 would recommend. Excellent service, they were so friendly. Great food, the ingredients really tasted great. Favorite pizza place.

name: Brad Freshour
text: The best of the "Subway" style pizza restaurants and it's not even close.  Resolve and Pie Five come up way short.  The spicy red sauce here is amazing.

name: Crystal Clow
text: I am pleasantly surprised by the pizza here. We have so many little wood fired pizza places in the city I wasn't sure If this one would stand out among the others, but it does. Lots of toppings in which to choose and they all seem fresh. ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Montgomery
text: Love the place . Love the pizza and toppings. Only thing I noticed that could be worked on was wiping and cleaning the tables more often. Most had small amounts of crumbles of food or sauce. But it was not horrible. Wish there was more locations through out the okc metro area.
